name: Railway Canyon
description:
Railway Canyon is a relaxing, easy-going puzzle game for a laid back experience.

The bandits are causing trouble in the wild west, they are trying to hijack the train and steal the cargo. Can you help to assemble the railway and move on before it's too late?

Railway Canyon features:

· 32 handcrafted wild west levels with relaxing vibes
· Play Offline, no internet connection required to play
· Beautiful, 3D artwork & animations.
· No violence, stress-free; play at your own pace.
· No ads, no in-app purchases. Buy it once, own it forever.
· Simple controls, suitable for any age
· Easy to learn; no instructions needed
· Haptic Feedback
· Optimized for all iOS devices.
· iMessage Stickers
